languages.text: "Мы понимаем тебя. Мы чувствуем то же самое. Стремление, неудержимую силу. Может быть, потому, что мы вкусили твою кровь", {n}— механический голос сервитора становится почти мечтательным.{/n} "И она все еще наполняет нас".

"We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."
languages.original_text: "Мы понимаем тебя. Мы чувствуем то же самое. Стремление, неудержимую силу. Может быть, потому, что мы вкусили твою кровь", {n}— механический голос сервитора становится почти мечтательным.{/n} "И она все еще наполняет нас".

traits.locale_text: "We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

"We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

"We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

"We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

"We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

"We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

languages.text: « Nous vous comprenons. Du moins, c'est que nous ressentons : ce désir, cette force irrépressible... peut-être est-ce parce que nous avons goûté votre sang. {n}La voix mécanique du servitor se fait presque rêveuse.{/n} Et elle nous emplit encore. »
languages.original_text: "We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

traits.locale_text: « Nous vous comprenons. Du moins, c'est que nous ressentons : ce désir, cette force irrépressible... peut-être est-ce parce que nous avons goûté votre sang. {n}La voix mécanique du servitor se fait presque rêveuse.{/n} Et elle nous emplit encore. »

languages.text: “我们能理解你。这是我们的感觉。那种冲动，那种无法抑制的力量。也许是因为我们尝过你的血。”{n}机仆机械的声音中突然爆发出近乎渴望的感情。{/n}“它仍然在我们体内流淌。”
languages.original_text: "We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

traits.locale_text: “我们能理解你。这是我们的感觉。那种冲动，那种无法抑制的力量。也许是因为我们尝过你的血。”{n}奴工机械的声音中突然爆发出近乎渴望的感情。{/n}“它仍然在我们体内流淌。”

languages.text: "Wir verstehen Euch. Es ist, was wir fühlen. Den Drang, die nicht zu unterdrückende Kraft. Vielleicht, weil wir Euer Blut gekostet haben." {n}Die mechanische Stimme des Servitors wird fast wehmütig.{/n} "Und es erfüllt uns noch immer."
languages.original_text: "We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

traits.locale_text: "Wir verstehen Euch. Es ist, was wir fühlen. Den Drang, die nicht zu unterdrückende Kraft. Vielleicht, weil wir Euer Blut gekostet haben." {n}Die mechanische Stimme des Servitors wird fast wehmütig.{/n} "Und es erfüllt uns noch immer."

languages.text: «Ahora te entendemos. Es lo que sentimos. El anhelo, la fuerza incontenible. Quizá es porque hemos probado tu sangre». {n}La voz mecánica del servidor adquiere un matiz de nostalgia.{/n} «Y todavía nos llena».
languages.original_text: "We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora te entendemos. Es lo que sentimos. El anhelo, la fuerza incontenible. Quizá es porque hemos probado tu sangre». {n}La voz mecánica del servidor adquiere un matiz de nostalgia.{/n} «Y todavía nos llena».

languages.text: 「私たちは、あなたを理解している。私たちもそれを感じる。衝動であり、抑えがたい力。私たちがあなたの血を味わったからかもしれない」{n}サーヴィターの機械的な声が切なげに話す。{/n}「そして、いまだに私たちの中に残り続けている」
languages.original_text: "We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは、あなたを理解している。私たちもそれを感じる。衝動であり、抑えがたい力。私たちがあなたの血を味わったからかもしれない」{n}サーヴィターの機械的な声が切なげに話す。{/n}「そして、いまだに私たちの中に残り続けている」

languages.text: "Sizi anlıyoruz. Bu dürtü, bu bastırılamaz kuvvet... Biz de hissediyoruz. Belki de kanınızın tadına baktığımız içindir." {n}Hizmetörün mekanik sesi, neredeyse hüzne bürünüyor.{/n} "Kanınız hâlâ içimizde..."
languages.original_text: "We understand you. It is what we feel. The urge, the irrepressible force. Perhaps it is because we have tasted your blood." {n}The servitor's mechanical voice grows almost wistful.{/n} "And it fills us still."

traits.locale_text: "Sizi anlıyoruz. Hissettiğimiz de bu. Bu dürtü, bu bastırılamaz kuvvet... Belki de kanınızın tadına baktığımız içindir." {n}Servitörün mekanik sesi, neredeyse hüzne bürünüyor.{/n} "Hâlâ içimizde..."
